item.title: Traffic Alert Collision Avoidance System (TCAS II) Resolution Advisory (RA) Display System(s) – (VSI/RA) One Display Inop (EFB Not Installed)

remarks.para: May be inoperative on non-flying pilot side.

numlitem.para: Monitor operative indications and respond accordingly.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to affected TCAS/VSI indicator "RA INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
